All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class HTTPServer
extends java.lang.Thread

This is the main thread of the appletserver.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Bjorn Husberg and Louise Tysk

run

public void run()
This method is called by the start()-method in the Thread-class. It loops infinitely, giving HTTPThreads to any incoming connection.
Overrides:
